name: libxft
desc:
libXft is the client side font rendering library, using
libfreetype, libX11, and the X Render extension to display anti-aliased
text.
Xft version 2.1 was the first stand alone release of Xft, a library
that connects X applications with the FreeType font rasterization
library. Xft uses fontconfig to locate fonts so it has no configuration
fil
